data.what_is: OneSignal is a customer engagement platform that enables companies of all sizes to increase retention and revenue through lightning-fast, personalized messaging. OneSignal supports email, push notifications, in-app messaging, SMS, Apple's Live Activities, and other channels via Webhooks. The platform is fast and easy for Developers to set up, and features an intuitive interface so Marketers are empowered to send messages without additional developper time. In addition to offering critical integrations, OneSignal also features an open API to allow greater messaging flexibility.
data.product_description: OneSignal is the market-leading omnichannel customer engagement platform for building customer relationships through personalized messaging across mobile and web push notifications, in-app messaging, SMS, and email.When it comes to setup and sending omnichannel messages, OneSignal is built for speed. Our market-leading messaging speed enables near-real-time messaging when seconds matter, and our easy to install SDKs and features like automated customer Journeys and tagging let you get started sending and personalizing messages without a prolonged implementation time. Our email auto warmup and IP warmup allow you to start sending emails that actually arrive in your customers inboxes quickly, reliably, and with little staff time dedicated to slowly increasing sends.

Personalize and test your way to growth with OneSignal's Growth Plan. 

Includes all features from Free plus:
The Professional plan allows for highly-advanced personalization to drive higher conversions. Includes all features from Growth plus:

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. 64 reviewers of OneSignal have provided feedback on this feature.

features.content: Based on 72 OneSignal reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. 62 reviewers of OneSignal have provided feedback on this feature.

initial_reviews.review_title: One Signal is an indispensable tool for our operations
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
As a user, I have found several aspects of the app particularly commendable.

Firstly, the intuitive and user-friendly interface has made navigation and usage remarkably straightforward. This ease of use significantly enhances the overall user experience, allowing for efficient management of notifications.

Secondly, the robust and customizable notification features are highly impressive. The ability to tailor notifications to specific audiences ensures that the right message reaches the right individuals at the optimal time. This functionality is invaluable for maintaining effective communication with users.

Moreover, the detailed analytics provided by OneSignal have been instrumental in understanding user engagement and behavior. These insights have enabled us to make informed decisions and improve our communication strategies.

Overall, OneSignal has proven to be an indispensable tool for our operations. I appreciate the continuous improvements and support provided by your team and look forward to seeing future advancements.

Thank you for developing such an excellent application.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
While I greatly appreciate the OneSignal application and its many features, I would like to share some aspects that I believe could be improved.

Firstly, I have noticed occasional delays in the delivery of notifications. While these instances are not frequent, they can be disruptive, particularly when timely communication is critical. Ensuring more consistent and immediate delivery would significantly enhance the reliability of the service.

Secondly, the user interface, while generally intuitive, can be overwhelming for new users. Simplifying the layout or providing more comprehensive onboarding tutorials would help users become proficient more quickly and with less frustration.

Thirdly, the customization options for notifications are extensive, but the process of setting them up can be complex. Streamlining these processes and offering more preset templates could save time and reduce errors.

Additionally, the integration with certain platforms and tools can sometimes be less seamless than expected. Enhanced compatibility and more streamlined integration processes would greatly improve overall efficiency and user satisfaction.

Lastly, providing more in-depth analytics and reporting features would be beneficial. Users could gain even deeper insights into their notification performance and user engagement, allowing for more informed decision-making.

I share this feedback in the hope of seeing further enhancements to an already excellent application. Thank you for your continuous efforts in developing and improving OneSignal

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal solves the problem of missed important updates by delivering timely notifications directly to users' devices, ensuring they stay informed. It tackles irrelevant notifications through audience segmentation, providing personalized content that enhances user engagement. Cross-platform messaging ensures consistent communication, offering a seamless experience across mobile, web, and email. Automated workflows enable timely responses to user actions, boosting satisfaction. Finally, detailed analytics help refine notification strategies, indirectly improving the overall user experience.

initial_reviews.review_title: Powerful and easy to setup
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
If you ever used any CRM tool and have setup journeys, automations and audiences, you'll find it pretty easy to get a hang of OneSignal. It's pretty straightforward to use and gives a lot of fliexibility to setup mobile pushes and in-app banners, even if you have close to zero knowledge about CRM. I've been delegating OneSignal related tasks to junior staff and in a week or two they've been flying with little to no supervision.

I was able to setup automated messages, sign-up and retention journeys with such ease. And even better: I could see the impact of each action week over week.

OneSignal also has a lot of integrations, which helps with in-depth analytics and with setting up cohorts with our CDP platform. It definetely became a daily tool for customer engagement and retention in our platofrm.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Only thing I actually miss in OneSignal is the ability to post a webhook in any other platform that fires a push notification through OneSignal (right now I can only use webhooks to send information out of OneSignal). And maybe a bit more flexibility on dynamic content (being able to fetch content from a source would be great)

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal mainly helped us guide new users through our app and later driving them back to our app if they stay away for too long. The impact of the journeys we've setup was huge.

initial_reviews.review_title: Reliable, relatively easy setup, good documentation, great support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
The documentation is mostly good (better than competitors), and the support is very helpful. I have requested help from support on multiple times and they have always been proactive. Setup was easier than other options, like Firebase.

Furthermore, the UI is good enough for non-technical users to design in-app messages.

Pricing is reasonable.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Although the integration is mostly easy, there was some difficulty with integration when it came to adding more than one Notification Service Extension (NSE) when there is more than one build version of the app. Support were helpful with this, though, and it ended up not being necessary for us to even use multiple NSEs at all (for our use case).

Although the documentation is mostly good, there are some things that need to be improved, for example the migration guide for the latest major version upgrade misses some key information like needing to replace the swift code that we use for OneSignal with a slightly modified one, and the readme is just a doc on github and not a thorough page on their docs site, which they did for the previous migration guide.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reliable targeting and sending of push notifications to users, and creation and segmentation of in-app messages for users.

initial_reviews.review_title: OneSignal is easy to use
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
What I like most as an ios engineer using OneSignal in their app is the ability to find my device (the one that I use for testing) and see what segments are active on my device. It's also easy to send test notifications to my device when I'm testing our push notification.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Setting a tag was confusing at first. Because if I want to turn ON a tag, I need to send the tag with a 'true' value, and when turning it off, I assumed I should just delete the tag, but instead, I have to send the tag with a 'false' value. But once these tags are setup properly, it's all good. These tags were used in our app to "subscribe" a user to a particular "topic/notification," and then, they can receive such topic/notifications if they have subscribed to it.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Push Notification, and In-app Messaging. We use OneSignal to send notifications to our users, and also send messages / promotions in-app, or even surveys. It's very useful for use to get user feedback. I am not from Marketing Team, but I coordinate with them a lot, since they are the ones who decide what events, tags to use and when to trigger them. It helps us raise our app engagement, and get feedback from the users by simply using the app.

It's also easy to send test notifications to my device when I'm testing our push notification.

initial_reviews.review_title: onesignal helps my clients come back
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I like the browser notifications they publish. When I publish a blog, I can send notifications to subscribed customers simultaneously. This will increase customer stickiness and greatly improve the number of return visits to my website.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I'm not particularly proficient in English. During the setup phase, I used the browser's built-in translator, but this caused onesignal to crash. It was extremely difficult for me to use it for the first time.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal's proactive push notification feature quickly informs subscribed customers after I publish a blog post, encouraging more customers to revisit my website. This increases user stickiness and interactivity. Additionally, OneSignal addresses the challenge of maintaining effective communication with users and increasing their engagement with my content. By utilizing OneSignal's advanced segmentation and targeting capabilities, I can tailor my messages to match the interests and behaviors of my audience, making the communication more relevant and engaging. The analytics and reporting tools offered by OneSignal also enable me to monitor the performance of my push notifications, helping me to continually refine my strategy to better meet the needs of my audience. Overall, OneSignal provides a comprehensive solution for improving user engagement and fostering a more interactive and personalized relationship with my audience, which is invaluable for growing my online presence.

review_question_answers.answer: I like the browser notifications they publish. When I publish a blog, I can send notifications to subscribed customers simultaneously. This will increase customer stickiness and greatly improve the number of return visits to my website.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about OneSignal?
review_question_answers.answer: I'm not particularly proficient in English. During the setup phase, I used the browser's built-in translator, but this caused onesignal to crash. It was extremely difficult for me to use it for the first time.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: OneSignal's proactive push notification feature quickly informs subscribed customers after I publish a blog post, encouraging more customers to revisit my website. This increases user stickiness and interactivity. Additionally, OneSignal addresses the challenge of maintaining effective communication with users and increasing their engagement with my content. By utilizing OneSignal's advanced segmentation and targeting capabilities, I can tailor my messages to match the interests and behaviors of my audience, making the communication more relevant and engaging. The analytics and reporting tools offered by OneSignal also enable me to monitor the performance of my push notifications, helping me to continually refine my strategy to better meet the needs of my audience. Overall, OneSignal provides a comprehensive solution for improving user engagement and fostering a more interactive and personalized relationship with my audience, which is invaluable for growing my online presence.

initial_reviews.review_title: One Signal helps us use notifications to push our blog readers into leads
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal has an east set up process that integrates with our Wordpress blog, making it no more than a click of a button to send out notifications to contacts who turn on push notifications in their browser. We can also track how many new people enable notifications for our site and how often people are clicking through, making it easy to track performance and to give us another way to engage with blog readers to help drive them to lead status.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Some of the free account features are a bit limited but if you're looking to simply try this tool out on your site, it offers enough for you evaluate the other elements it offers too.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We get a pretty significant amount of blog traffic to our site that doesn't always engage with on-page CTAs or enroll directly into our newsletter sign up. Since this is enabled through the user's browser, we're able to take advantage of the notification option to help re-engage readers who may have not converted directly. As part of our strategy this helps us notify existing leads as well as potential leads about new relevant content we're sharing on our blog.

initial_reviews.review_title: Flexibility and adaptation to the needs of the customer
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
During years, we have worked with OneSignal's push notifications festures, and it has been a success. Beyond how well the product has worked for us, I want to highlight the good rapport and effort of their Customer Success team in understanding the issues or challenges that customers like us present. Specifically, I would like to commend Italo Zunino. Firstly, Italo always seeks to understand the business and explore possible avenues for collaboration. This is evident in the questions he asks at the end of the discussion about the business. Secondly, the proposals he makes always adapt to the volume or circumstances of the business. It has truly been a pleasure to work with him, and in our case, the success of our continued collaboration with OneSignal is thanks to him.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
There is no specific things that we really dislike.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Push notifications to the users of our customers

initial_reviews.review_title: A Reliable and Easy-to-Use Platform for Customer Engagement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I have been using OneSignal for a few months and I am very satisfied with their service. OneSignal is a reliable and easy-to-use platform for sending push notifications, email, SMS, and in-app messages to my customers. I like how I can segment, personalize, and automate my messages based on various criteria. OneSignal also provides useful analytics and A/B testing features to help me optimize my campaigns. OneSignal is a great tool for customer engagement and retention.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I think OneSignal is a bit expensive for the features it offers. I wish they had more flexible pricing plans and discounts for small businesses. I also find their user interface not very user-friendly and intuitive. Sometimes it takes me a long time to set up and test my campaigns.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal is solving the problem of customer engagement and retention in a mobile-centric world. It allows me to communicate with my app users through various channels, such as push notifications, email, SMS, and in-app messages. I can create personalized and automated messages based on user behavior, preferences, and location. I can also measure the effectiveness of my messages and optimize them with A/B testing and analytics. OneSignal is benefiting me by increasing user loyalty, satisfaction, and conversion rates. It is also saving me time and money by providing a simple and powerful platform for all my messaging needs

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I've had an issue implementing live activity with OS feature on our app and reached to get some help.

I got nice, helpful and super quick replies from the start, from getting connected to the right person to setting up a call to discuss further. Juan was my point of contact, he was helpful provinding lots of detail, even after the call, sending me snippets of code and more links to the docs. I met Dominick on the call who shared his screen walking me through OS newest LA updates and helped troubleshoot what could be going wrong on my side.

With both Juan and Dominick we managed to resolve my issue. I was positively surprised with the kind of suport I got, the speed and the quality of it, which were both superb. Thank you

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I do not have anything to add here at the moment.

The fact that I can send notification from the Flutter SDK without writing API codes.
Individual Notifications, targeting a user across multiple devices
I can programmatically remove a notification. I used to dream of this one till I recently found out it was right there in the SDK

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I really don't think I have any dislikes

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. When using Firebase Cloud Messaging, I have the challenge of writing Clou`d Messaging server side code, but here I can easily do that in Frontend.

2. Of all notification platforms I have tried, iOS set-up is always complicated and sometimes never works, Onesignal set-up has been so easy for me and effectiveso far

3. Also, I can see a dashboard for everything. The stats is there.

4. Lastly, the fast that I can everything notification in one place is pretty great. push, sms and emails.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great solution for push notifications
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
We use OneSignal for a limited scope: push notifications only. For that purpose, OneSignal has been great for it's ease of use and it's simple pricing plan.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
My only real concern was about the speed of updating their Android SDK when an issue arose from an update to Android. One nitpick might be that their analytics downloads could use better documentation/column header naming convention.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were not doing a good job on engaging our users who had the mobile app installed, missing engagement from those users. We decided to utilize OneSIgnal to do push notifications to drive our users to the stories within the app. We started modestly, but in the last few months have ramped it up to 1 per day. OneSignal has been key to this strategy. We're not starting to push out even more per day. Again, OneSignal's simple pricing lets us ramp up without additional costs other than those associated with user base growth (which is a good thing).

initial_reviews.review_title: These guys offer an amazing product, with great documentation and support.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Ease of implementation and use.  Their documentation is robust, well written, and very easy to understand, and on top of that they have video tutorials on YouTube.

They also have amazing support!  I have only needed help from them once, while trying to use push notifications to update a Live Activity in iOS.  I contacted them via their online chat system and got a very quick response.  They stayed engaged until I had things working on my end.  Brit in particular was super helpful!

I can't recommend them strongly enough.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Absolutly nothing.  There is no downside to using this service.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
My iOS app supports Live Activities, and needs to update even if the user has killed the app.  This requires push notifications, and OneSignal makes it almost trivial to solve this problem.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
-The onboarding to onesignal has been great. We have a global team with a lot of different needs and the team has been incredibly accomidating in ensuring that each region has the tools and skills they need to get up and running.
-The tool is powerful and highly customizable. With the ability to segment and trigger on actions the onesignal tool will allow us to communicate with appropriate users in the right moment

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
-The tool has been initially tricky to learn and requires more custom development than we originally anticipated.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
With such a large pool of users with vastly different needs OneSignal allows us to segment those users well to match our business units. This segmentation allows the right team to own the communication with the user segments that they serve with the information that makes the most sense for those particular users.

initial_reviews.review_title: Everything has been seamless so far
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I've been using Onesignal for almost 3 years now, it's very easy to get started with anad implement across web and mobile platforms.
To also add, they have a very sweet API docyuumentation which I have used to implement server side notifications in the past.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
If there's one thing I'd like to see, it'd be Onesignal providing their own SMS provider rather than using a third party provider. Nothing beats having just one platform for all one's notification and promotional services

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing, targetting a group of people and individuals, using live activities (though I would love to see this feature more on Android if possible).

initial_reviews.review_title: Onesignal makes the impossible possible
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Push notifications are really deeply complicated entities, but OneSignal makes setting them up easy with well-documented SDKs, a robust API, and excellent web dashboards to help figure out the invisible stuff. I was able to get Firebase Cloud Messaging working pretty easily on my .NET 7 server app, which is nearly impossible using conventional libraries (they only support .NET 6). Installing the client SDK took me less than 5 minutes, which was shocking. Server was tougher, but now it runs flawlessly.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
.NET SDK documentation has some holes -- it is difficult to see what fields are required. I was getting vague exception errors and didn't know where they were coming from until I got the basics sent over. The SDK is also missing a GetSegments function that is in the REST API. I wasn't sure about the official names of my segments until I queried via REST.

Otherwise it's all great!

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
I couldn't get Firebase Cloud Messaging set up with .NET 7. Packages are not up to date and Microsoft's "documentation" is a 44-minute video of a guy doing a powerpoint with a super thick accent. OneSignal let me skip all that.

all_reviews.review_title: One Signal is an indispensable tool for our operations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
As a user, I have found several aspects of the app particularly commendable.

Firstly, the intuitive and user-friendly interface has made navigation and usage remarkably straightforward. This ease of use significantly enhances the overall user experience, allowing for efficient management of notifications.

Secondly, the robust and customizable notification features are highly impressive. The ability to tailor notifications to specific audiences ensures that the right message reaches the right individuals at the optimal time. This functionality is invaluable for maintaining effective communication with users.

Moreover, the detailed analytics provided by OneSignal have been instrumental in understanding user engagement and behavior. These insights have enabled us to make informed decisions and improve our communication strategies.

Overall, OneSignal has proven to be an indispensable tool for our operations. I appreciate the continuous improvements and support provided by your team and look forward to seeing future advancements.

Thank you for developing such an excellent application.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
While I greatly appreciate the OneSignal application and its many features, I would like to share some aspects that I believe could be improved.

Firstly, I have noticed occasional delays in the delivery of notifications. While these instances are not frequent, they can be disruptive, particularly when timely communication is critical. Ensuring more consistent and immediate delivery would significantly enhance the reliability of the service.

Secondly, the user interface, while generally intuitive, can be overwhelming for new users. Simplifying the layout or providing more comprehensive onboarding tutorials would help users become proficient more quickly and with less frustration.

Thirdly, the customization options for notifications are extensive, but the process of setting them up can be complex. Streamlining these processes and offering more preset templates could save time and reduce errors.

Additionally, the integration with certain platforms and tools can sometimes be less seamless than expected. Enhanced compatibility and more streamlined integration processes would greatly improve overall efficiency and user satisfaction.

Lastly, providing more in-depth analytics and reporting features would be beneficial. Users could gain even deeper insights into their notification performance and user engagement, allowing for more informed decision-making.

I share this feedback in the hope of seeing further enhancements to an already excellent application. Thank you for your continuous efforts in developing and improving OneSignal

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal solves the problem of missed important updates by delivering timely notifications directly to users' devices, ensuring they stay informed. It tackles irrelevant notifications through audience segmentation, providing personalized content that enhances user engagement. Cross-platform messaging ensures consistent communication, offering a seamless experience across mobile, web, and email. Automated workflows enable timely responses to user actions, boosting satisfaction. Finally, detailed analytics help refine notification strategies, indirectly improving the overall user experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful and easy to setup
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
If you ever used any CRM tool and have setup journeys, automations and audiences, you'll find it pretty easy to get a hang of OneSignal. It's pretty straightforward to use and gives a lot of fliexibility to setup mobile pushes and in-app banners, even if you have close to zero knowledge about CRM. I've been delegating OneSignal related tasks to junior staff and in a week or two they've been flying with little to no supervision.

I was able to setup automated messages, sign-up and retention journeys with such ease. And even better: I could see the impact of each action week over week.

OneSignal also has a lot of integrations, which helps with in-depth analytics and with setting up cohorts with our CDP platform. It definetely became a daily tool for customer engagement and retention in our platofrm.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Only thing I actually miss in OneSignal is the ability to post a webhook in any other platform that fires a push notification through OneSignal (right now I can only use webhooks to send information out of OneSignal). And maybe a bit more flexibility on dynamic content (being able to fetch content from a source would be great)

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal mainly helped us guide new users through our app and later driving them back to our app if they stay away for too long. The impact of the journeys we've setup was huge.

all_reviews.review_title: Reliable, relatively easy setup, good documentation, great support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
The documentation is mostly good (better than competitors), and the support is very helpful. I have requested help from support on multiple times and they have always been proactive. Setup was easier than other options, like Firebase.

Furthermore, the UI is good enough for non-technical users to design in-app messages.

Pricing is reasonable.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Although the integration is mostly easy, there was some difficulty with integration when it came to adding more than one Notification Service Extension (NSE) when there is more than one build version of the app. Support were helpful with this, though, and it ended up not being necessary for us to even use multiple NSEs at all (for our use case).

Although the documentation is mostly good, there are some things that need to be improved, for example the migration guide for the latest major version upgrade misses some key information like needing to replace the swift code that we use for OneSignal with a slightly modified one, and the readme is just a doc on github and not a thorough page on their docs site, which they did for the previous migration guide.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reliable targeting and sending of push notifications to users, and creation and segmentation of in-app messages for users.

Pricing is reasonable.

all_reviews.review_title: OneSignal is easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
What I like most as an ios engineer using OneSignal in their app is the ability to find my device (the one that I use for testing) and see what segments are active on my device. It's also easy to send test notifications to my device when I'm testing our push notification.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Setting a tag was confusing at first. Because if I want to turn ON a tag, I need to send the tag with a 'true' value, and when turning it off, I assumed I should just delete the tag, but instead, I have to send the tag with a 'false' value. But once these tags are setup properly, it's all good. These tags were used in our app to "subscribe" a user to a particular "topic/notification," and then, they can receive such topic/notifications if they have subscribed to it.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Push Notification, and In-app Messaging. We use OneSignal to send notifications to our users, and also send messages / promotions in-app, or even surveys. It's very useful for use to get user feedback. I am not from Marketing Team, but I coordinate with them a lot, since they are the ones who decide what events, tags to use and when to trigger them. It helps us raise our app engagement, and get feedback from the users by simply using the app.

all_reviews.review_title: onesignal helps my clients come back
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I like the browser notifications they publish. When I publish a blog, I can send notifications to subscribed customers simultaneously. This will increase customer stickiness and greatly improve the number of return visits to my website.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I'm not particularly proficient in English. During the setup phase, I used the browser's built-in translator, but this caused onesignal to crash. It was extremely difficult for me to use it for the first time.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal's proactive push notification feature quickly informs subscribed customers after I publish a blog post, encouraging more customers to revisit my website. This increases user stickiness and interactivity. Additionally, OneSignal addresses the challenge of maintaining effective communication with users and increasing their engagement with my content. By utilizing OneSignal's advanced segmentation and targeting capabilities, I can tailor my messages to match the interests and behaviors of my audience, making the communication more relevant and engaging. The analytics and reporting tools offered by OneSignal also enable me to monitor the performance of my push notifications, helping me to continually refine my strategy to better meet the needs of my audience. Overall, OneSignal provides a comprehensive solution for improving user engagement and fostering a more interactive and personalized relationship with my audience, which is invaluable for growing my online presence.

all_reviews.review_title: One Signal helps us use notifications to push our blog readers into leads
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal has an east set up process that integrates with our Wordpress blog, making it no more than a click of a button to send out notifications to contacts who turn on push notifications in their browser. We can also track how many new people enable notifications for our site and how often people are clicking through, making it easy to track performance and to give us another way to engage with blog readers to help drive them to lead status.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Some of the free account features are a bit limited but if you're looking to simply try this tool out on your site, it offers enough for you evaluate the other elements it offers too.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We get a pretty significant amount of blog traffic to our site that doesn't always engage with on-page CTAs or enroll directly into our newsletter sign up. Since this is enabled through the user's browser, we're able to take advantage of the notification option to help re-engage readers who may have not converted directly. As part of our strategy this helps us notify existing leads as well as potential leads about new relevant content we're sharing on our blog.

all_reviews.review_title: A Reliable and Easy-to-Use Platform for Customer Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I have been using OneSignal for a few months and I am very satisfied with their service. OneSignal is a reliable and easy-to-use platform for sending push notifications, email, SMS, and in-app messages to my customers. I like how I can segment, personalize, and automate my messages based on various criteria. OneSignal also provides useful analytics and A/B testing features to help me optimize my campaigns. OneSignal is a great tool for customer engagement and retention.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I think OneSignal is a bit expensive for the features it offers. I wish they had more flexible pricing plans and discounts for small businesses. I also find their user interface not very user-friendly and intuitive. Sometimes it takes me a long time to set up and test my campaigns.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal is solving the problem of customer engagement and retention in a mobile-centric world. It allows me to communicate with my app users through various channels, such as push notifications, email, SMS, and in-app messages. I can create personalized and automated messages based on user behavior, preferences, and location. I can also measure the effectiveness of my messages and optimize them with A/B testing and analytics. OneSignal is benefiting me by increasing user loyalty, satisfaction, and conversion rates. It is also saving me time and money by providing a simple and powerful platform for all my messaging needs

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I've had an issue implementing live activity with OS feature on our app and reached to get some help.

I got nice, helpful and super quick replies from the start, from getting connected to the right person to setting up a call to discuss further. Juan was my point of contact, he was helpful provinding lots of detail, even after the call, sending me snippets of code and more links to the docs. I met Dominick on the call who shared his screen walking me through OS newest LA updates and helped troubleshoot what could be going wrong on my side.

With both Juan and Dominick we managed to resolve my issue. I was positively surprised with the kind of suport I got, the speed and the quality of it, which were both superb. Thank you

I do not have anything to add here at the moment.

The fact that I can send notification from the Flutter SDK without writing API codes.
Individual Notifications, targeting a user across multiple devices
I can programmatically remove a notification. I used to dream of this one till I recently found out it was right there in the SDK

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I really don't think I have any dislikes

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. When using Firebase Cloud Messaging, I have the challenge of writing Clou`d Messaging server side code, but here I can easily do that in Frontend.

2. Of all notification platforms I have tried, iOS set-up is always complicated and sometimes never works, Onesignal set-up has been so easy for me and effectiveso far

3. Also, I can see a dashboard for everything. The stats is there.

4. Lastly, the fast that I can everything notification in one place is pretty great. push, sms and emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Great solution for push notifications
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
We use OneSignal for a limited scope: push notifications only. For that purpose, OneSignal has been great for it's ease of use and it's simple pricing plan.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
My only real concern was about the speed of updating their Android SDK when an issue arose from an update to Android. One nitpick might be that their analytics downloads could use better documentation/column header naming convention.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were not doing a good job on engaging our users who had the mobile app installed, missing engagement from those users. We decided to utilize OneSIgnal to do push notifications to drive our users to the stories within the app. We started modestly, but in the last few months have ramped it up to 1 per day. OneSignal has been key to this strategy. We're not starting to push out even more per day. Again, OneSignal's simple pricing lets us ramp up without additional costs other than those associated with user base growth (which is a good thing).

all_reviews.review_title: These guys offer an amazing product, with great documentation and support.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Ease of implementation and use.  Their documentation is robust, well written, and very easy to understand, and on top of that they have video tutorials on YouTube.

They also have amazing support!  I have only needed help from them once, while trying to use push notifications to update a Live Activity in iOS.  I contacted them via their online chat system and got a very quick response.  They stayed engaged until I had things working on my end.  Brit in particular was super helpful!

I can't recommend them strongly enough.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Absolutly nothing.  There is no downside to using this service.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
My iOS app supports Live Activities, and needs to update even if the user has killed the app.  This requires push notifications, and OneSignal makes it almost trivial to solve this problem.

all_reviews.review_title: Onesignal makes the impossible possible
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Push notifications are really deeply complicated entities, but OneSignal makes setting them up easy with well-documented SDKs, a robust API, and excellent web dashboards to help figure out the invisible stuff. I was able to get Firebase Cloud Messaging working pretty easily on my .NET 7 server app, which is nearly impossible using conventional libraries (they only support .NET 6). Installing the client SDK took me less than 5 minutes, which was shocking. Server was tougher, but now it runs flawlessly.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
.NET SDK documentation has some holes -- it is difficult to see what fields are required. I was getting vague exception errors and didn't know where they were coming from until I got the basics sent over. The SDK is also missing a GetSegments function that is in the REST API. I wasn't sure about the official names of my segments until I queried via REST.

Otherwise it's all great!

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
I couldn't get Firebase Cloud Messaging set up with .NET 7. Packages are not up to date and Microsoft's "documentation" is a 44-minute video of a guy doing a powerpoint with a super thick accent. OneSignal let me skip all that.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about OneSignal?
review_question_answers.answer: Push notifications are really deeply complicated entities, but OneSignal makes setting them up easy with well-documented SDKs, a robust API, and excellent web dashboards to help figure out the invisible stuff. I was able to get Firebase Cloud Messaging working pretty easily on my .NET 7 server app, which is nearly impossible using conventional libraries (they only support .NET 6). Installing the client SDK took me less than 5 minutes, which was shocking. Server was tougher, but now it runs flawlessly.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about OneSignal?
review_question_answers.answer:
.NET SDK documentation has some holes -- it is difficult to see what fields are required. I was getting vague exception errors and didn't know where they were coming from until I got the basics sent over. The SDK is also missing a GetSegments function that is in the REST API. I wasn't sure about the official names of my segments until I queried via REST.

Otherwise it's all great!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I couldn't get Firebase Cloud Messaging set up with .NET 7. Packages are not up to date and Microsoft's "documentation" is a 44-minute video of a guy doing a powerpoint with a super thick accent. OneSignal let me skip all that.

all_reviews.review_title: Works flawlessly
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I used to use google/firebase cloud notification. Before OneSignal, notifications were a "high risk" thing - something that took about 3 days to set up and might break here and there, vs different applications, and they would be a total pain to debug. Especially when you consider different behaviors on low battery devices, manufacturers, and so on.

One Signal is just plain reliable for this - notifications went from a "high risk" to "no problem" when planning. The debug and template tools they provide is great too.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
It feels a bit aged at times. They're able to keep up to date with some of the new OS changes, but it's been the same thing over years.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
It works well for targeted silent notifications (e.g. telling the app that data has changed) and push notification (telling the user something).

all_reviews.review_title: OneSignal is revolutionizing communication
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal's standout feature are journeys, which enable users to create highly personalized and automated communication flows. These journeys help optimize every step of our communication funnel by allowing us to target specific segments of our audience with tailored messages at the right time. From onboarding new users to re-engaging dormant ones, OneSignal's journeys empower us to deliver timely and relevant notifications, leading to improved user engagement and conversion rates.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
While OneSignal offers a robust set of features, a more comprehensive API would be beneficial. Although their current API allows for basic interactions, having a more extensive and granular API would provide us with greater flexibility and customization options.

Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
It's a fantastic all-around communication tool that is great for notifications. To get that extra analytical power, I recommend integrating it with a platform like Google Analytics or Amplitude.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal solves the problem of effectively communicating with users by providing a comprehensive platform for delivering targeted and timely notifications. With the ability to create customized journeys, we can optimize our communication funnel at every step. This is particularly beneficial in our rapidly changing industry, as we can use journeys to onboard new users and provide relevant updates. By utilizing OneSignal's journeys, we ensure that our messages are delivered to the right users at the right time, leading to improved user engagement.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about OneSignal?
review_question_answers.answer: OneSignal's standout feature are journeys, which enable users to create highly personalized and automated communication flows. These journeys help optimize every step of our communication funnel by allowing us to target specific segments of our audience with tailored messages at the right time. From onboarding new users to re-engaging dormant ones, OneSignal's journeys empower us to deliver timely and relevant notifications, leading to improved user engagement and conversion rates.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about OneSignal?
review_question_answers.answer: While OneSignal offers a robust set of features, a more comprehensive API would be beneficial. Although their current API allows for basic interactions, having a more extensive and granular API would provide us with greater flexibility and customization options.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
review_question_answers.answer: It's a fantastic all-around communication tool that is great for notifications. To get that extra analytical power, I recommend integrating it with a platform like Google Analytics or Amplitude.

all_reviews.review_content:

OneSignal is one of the most crucial tools for our business model, which is 'Uber for trucks'. In an industry that traditionally operates very manually, where drivers park their vehicles in freight markets to find cargo, OneSignal enables us to notify users of the nearest and most immediate loads without them even having to open the app. In this rapidly evolving and highly competitive sector, not only are we making it easier for drivers, but with the help of OneSignal, we are also changing a long-standing habit.

While onesignal offers many features. It may be more user-friendly for non-tech teams. In addition it may be more flexible for user segmentation and journey creation.

Onesignal allows to communicate with users with  segmentized and customized communication channels. We have many segmentations for our both B2B and B2C customers and onesignal helps to communicate with them easily.

all_reviews.review_title: great support provided to resolve an integration issue with Apple
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
- Free plan is a great opportunity to test all provided features
- The notification service is easy to integrate, it offers several filters and it works well
- The Voip notification service works well
- Te documentation is clear and exhaustive
- Great support to address and resolve integration issue

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
- It could be easier to debug
- The security should be improved especially for the creation of the player (no Auth is required)
- Scheduling to multiple mediums can be difficult - for instance, we have to do separate notifications for our simple and voip notification in 2 apps

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Although the free plan does not offer dedicated support their engineer are very knowledgeable and willing to help. We faced an integration issue with Voip notification on Apple platform and thanks to Dominick of OneSignal we was able to resolve it. He provided us suggestions and  a complete and clear video with all the steps to reproduce in order to correctly configure, send and receive Voip notification: we highly recommend him!

all_reviews.review_title: A great way to increase user retention
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Setup of push notifications is easy, especially with OneSignal's own WordPress plugin, but advanced customization of the signup alerts and segmentation is also simple thanks to the Javascript SDK. The interface to send push notifications is clear and concise, and being able to segment (by interest and country), schedule and retarget means it has everything we need to bring visitors back.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I can't actually think of any disadvantages.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a news publication, bringing users back to the site and improving retention rates is key, and OneSignal helps us do that. It's always a challenge getting new users to subscribe, but we've been surprised at the open rates for the notifications, and have easily brought in millions of additional pageviews.

all_reviews.review_title: OneSignal key to improving healthcare collaboration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Of the different solutions we looked at for messaging, OneSignal was by far the easiest to integrate, both in our Flutter app and on the backend. Testing was a breeze as well. They make it easy to send ad hoc messages and manage campaigns and audiences from their dashboard. OneSignal is a key to enhancing the collaboration within the healthcare teams using our platform.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
The documentation is good, but we have found out-of-date documentation at times, especially regarding Ionic/Capacitor integration (which we used in a different prototype).

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use it for two reasons:
1. Sharing of information within healthcare teams about a child (patient)
2. Announcements & marketing when we have new content available (blogs, video courses, etc)

all_reviews.review_title: Surprisingly Powerful!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Once I started to understand what OneSignal is and how to make it work for me, the power of the system astonished me. I'm simply using it today for web push notifications, although I can see migrating all my SMS and even some email over time. The web push technology is very flexible and powerful, it's literally kept me up at night dreaming of what's possible!

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I subscribed to OneSignal long before I took the time to understand and use it. The learning curve was surprisingly steep at first, but as soon as things started to "click", the power of it took hold. Their training and documentation are actually really good, but the very first couple of steps were daunting. I'm not even sure this is a negative, it's just a fact that it's fairly technical for a non-developer to understand and implement.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using OneSignal to deliver push notifications with deep links to our training website to our paying subscribers and to augment/replace daily training emails.

all_reviews.review_title: A Game-Changer for Our Notifications!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
We've been using the OneSignal app for our push notification needs, and let us tell you--it's been an absolute game-changer for our communication strategy! 

From the moment we integrated OneSignal into our platform, we've experienced a seamless and efficient way to engage with our audience. The features offered are nothing short of impressive. The ability to tailor notifications based on user preferences has significantly boosted user engagement and satisfaction.

OneSignal's intuitive dashboard makes crafting and scheduling notifications a breeze. We've been able to segment our audience effectively and send personalized messages that resonate with our users, resulting in increased click-through rates and conversions.

What truly stands out is the app's reliability and performance. Our notifications reach users promptly, and the analytics provided give us valuable insights into user behavior, helping us fine-tune our communication strategy for even better results.

But it's not just about the features; OneSignal's customer support deserves a shoutout too. Their team is responsive, knowledgeable, and always ready to assist, ensuring that our experience remains top-notch.

In a world where effective communication is key, the OneSignal app has become an indispensable tool in our toolkit. It has transformed the way we connect with our users, helping us foster stronger relationships and drive meaningful interactions.

If you're looking for a push notification solution that delivers results, offers customization, and comes with stellar support, look no further than OneSignal. It's been a game-changer for us, and we wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking to elevate their notification strategy!

Disclaimer: This review is based on our genuine experience with the OneSignal app. We have not received any incentives or compensation for writing this review.

Keeping our subscribers updated.

The ability to tailor notifications based on user preferences has significantly boosted user engagement and satisfaction.

OneSignal's intuitive dashboard makes crafting and scheduling notifications a breeze. We've been able to segment our audience effectively and send personalized messages that resonate with our users, resulting in increased click-through rates and conversions.

What truly stands out is the app's reliability and performance. Our notifications reach users promptly, and the analytics provided give us valuable insights into user behavior, helping us fine-tune our communication strategy for even better results.

But it's not just about the features; OneSignal's customer support deserves a shoutout too. Their team is responsive, knowledgeable, and always ready to assist, ensuring that our experience remains top-notch.

In a world where effective communication is key, the OneSignal app has become an indispensable tool in our toolkit. It has transformed the way we connect with our users, helping us foster stronger relationships and drive meaningful interactions.

If you're looking for a push notification solution that delivers results, offers customization, and comes with stellar support, look no further than OneSignal. It's been a game-changer for us, and we wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking to elevate their notification strategy!

Disclaimer: This review is based on our genuine experience with the OneSignal app. We have not received any incentives or compensation for writing this review.

all_reviews.review_title: OneSignal is amazing and your support team matches the quality of the software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
The documentation is complete, clear and with examples for all possible languages, in addition to an excellent support team, especially Dominick, who was very attentive and patient, helping me to correct some problems in installing the SDK for Capacitor in Xcode.

I've been using OneSignal in my projects with Ionic for a few years (since Cordova, now with Capacitor), and I'm delighted with all the features, even though I still have the free plan. I can't wait to upgrade my plan!

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
There's nothing I don't like about OneSignal, as I've had great experiences with the software and support team so far, so I have nothing to complain about!

The only nasty surprise I had was that the gift card promotion was no longer available when I entered the G2 page, but I made a point of leaving my sincere feedback because you deserve it!

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an app in the area of gyms, studios and personal trainers, it is essential to be able to send notifications to users, either for an update on your workouts made by your coach or even for some vital notice from your gym.

OneSignal helps me keep my users engaged, thus maintaining retention and increasing the interaction between themselves in my app.

all_reviews.review_title: reviw
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
User-friendly Interface: OneSignal offers an intuitive dashboard that allows users to easily create and manage notifications.

Wide Platform Support: OneSignal provides support for a broad range of platforms including web (Chrome, Safari, Firefox), mobile (iOS, Android), and even desktop (Windows, macOS).

Rich Notification Features: Users can send rich notifications containing images, emojis, and action buttons.

Segmentation: OneSignal offers robust user segmentation features that allow users to target specific groups based on behavior, location, and other criteria.

Automated Messaging: OneSignal allows users to set up automated messages based on triggers or user behavior.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Customization Limitations: Advanced users and developers might find certain aspects of OneSignal less customizable than they would prefer, especially when compared to building a custom notification system.

Integration Issues: Some users have reported occasional challenges when integrating OneSignal with specific platforms or tools.

Frequency Capping: As of my last update, some users wanted more refined control over frequency capping to prevent overwhelming end-users with notifications.

Support Concerns: While many users find OneSignal's support helpful, there are always cases where users might feel their issues weren't addressed promptly or adequately.

Performance Issues: Some users have reported delays or inconsistencies in notification delivery, especially during high-traffic periods.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
User Engagement: In today's digital landscape, keeping users engaged with applications and websites is a significant challenge. OneSignal provides tools to send push notifications, in-app messages, and emails to re-engage users.

Multi-platform Communication: Managing notifications across various platforms (web, mobile, desktop) can be complex. OneSignal offers a unified solution that supports a wide range of platforms.

Personalization: Generic messages often don't resonate with users. OneSignal allows for personalized notifications based on user behavior, preferences, and other criteria.

Automation: Engaging users at the right time is crucial. With OneSignal, businesses can set up automated messages triggered by specific events or user actions.

all_reviews.review_title: Exceptional professional support of a high quality product.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
We all wish that integrating software into an existing application was always easy. Unfortunately that is not always the case. As a developer, the installation process can be well documented, but still leave you with questions and an inconsistent experience.

I reached out to OneSignal after ruling out the obvious on my end. Marc provided technical support for my case and went above and beyond to help me. I was very impressed with the personalized support.

Marc listened to me and understood what I had already attempted. Marc got hands on and started testing in the browser and ultimately helped us identify that something in one of our bundles was preventing the OneSignal code from running.

Very grateful for this level of knowledgeable support. Thank you!

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I want to be clear that the issue we encountered is not due to any problem with OneSignal's software, but the inherenet complexity in modern applications. I did not have any issues with OneSignal's product.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of our client's has requested Push Notifications for an interactive experience based application. We've struggled with partial implementations from similar products, but OneSignal so far has provided us the most complete, least problematic (for end-users) way to achieve this.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple and user-friendly platform with wonderful people in support!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
The platform is simple and easy to use - you can start sending notifications just a couple of minutes after logging in. I really like the documentation pages as they provide step-by-step instructions and explanations for most features. Also, most of the support does a great job - Jon has helped me to solve the issue I was struggling with for a long time.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
The simplicity of the platform is also a disadvantage - it lacks some features that could be useful, e.g., user path planning tool with all the other features included (I know it's in development), automatic retargeting, or test cloning.

Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
If you are looking for an easy-to-use notification tool with quite a lot of possibilities and excellent support, that's the one.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
I managed to make the notifications more attractive by using, e.g., rich media, and to time them better with the intelligent delivery feature. I also noticed that thanks to the help of OneSignal Customer Success Team and the support, I improved the performance of my notifications in general which positively influences the retention rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Very disappointed and frustrated: Email and SMS features didn't work as they promised us
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
We switched to Onesignal when Mixpanel's messaging features (Email and SMS) were about to be deprecated around the end of 2021.

Mixpanel suggested some messaging partners, but most of them were very expensive.

Onesignal was one of the affordable ones, so that's why we started using it.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Onesignal promised us they had solid email and SMS automation features and had the fastest sync time with Mixpanel cohorts, which we were using for targeting users.

After starting using Onesignal, we realized almost none of them were true:

1. Basic email automation features such as adding someone to CC or BCC or even adding a preheader were missing at the time.
2. There was no SMS automation: they openly lied to us. Their SMS feature was only for sending one-off SMS messages. I had to write my own automation Python script to send automated SMS messages via Onesignal API.
3. Email delivery metrics cannot be seen on their platform; you need to download a big CSV file every 30 days or connect to their API to see crucial email delivery numbers for each email template.
4. Mixpanel cohort sync took much more than 15 minutes, their promised time. This has been causing sending the same message to a user multiple times. I spent countless hours fixing it by updating cohorts, changing my Python script for SMS delivery, etc.
5. Last but not least, there is always something getting broken, and they don't care to let their users know. For example, yesterday, I noticed that some of the Mixpanel cohorts hadn't been synced for 2 months!

In short, Onesignal cost us much more than what we paid them, as hours spent fixing stuff, lost revenue because of the misdelivery of messages, and frustrated users.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using OneSignal for behavioral email and SMS marketing. We are using Mixpanel as the source of the cohorts. We tried web push but the engagement was low, so we stopped using it.

The audiences tab is very complicated and as I said before it would be nice to have an update on audience builder.

Simplify communication with automation.

all_reviews.review_title: Best application to send notification
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal is a highly effective notification tool that simplifies the process of sending notifications, creating user segments, and identifying paid users using user tags. The platform is fast, reliable, and always available, making it a reliable choice for businesses of all sizes. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, OneSignal is a must-have tool for any business that wants to stay connected with its users in real-time. Overall, OneSignal is a great choice for businesses looking for a reliable and effective notification platform.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I have noticed that OneSignal can be slow at times, which can be frustrating when trying to send time-sensitive notifications. Additionally, I have found that the SDK takes up a lot of space, which can be a concern for mobile apps with limited storage capacity.

Moreover, I was disappointed to learn that OneSignal recently reduced the number of tags available in its paid tier, which may limit my ability to effectively segment and target users.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal has been a valuable tool for my business by helping to increase user activity and retention. With OneSignal's notification system, I can easily inform users about new educational content that has been added to my app, which has helped to keep them engaged and coming back for more. Additionally, I have been able to use OneSignal to persuade users to upgrade to a premium plan by sending targeted notifications that highlight the additional benefits of the premium plan. Overall, OneSignal has been instrumental in driving user engagement and retention, and I highly recommend it to other businesses looking to increase their user activity and revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: I appreciate OneSignal for its ease of integration and powerful targeting features.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
What I like best about OneSignal is its seamless integration process, which allows developers to effortlessly implement push notifications, enhancing user engagement and overall app experience across multiple platforms.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
OneSignal is a versatile push notification service with many benefits, but there are a few concerns that users should consider. Firstly, privacy concerns may arise when sharing user data with a third-party service. Ensuring data protection and compliance with regulations like GDPR is essential for maintaining user trust. Secondly, the potential for vendor lock-in exists when heavily relying on OneSignal for push notifications. This may pose challenges if developers need to switch to another provider, as it could require significant code refactoring and adaptation. While OneSignal offers a range of features, users should weigh these concerns against their project requirements before committing to the service.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal solves the problem of effectively engaging users through targeted push notifications and in-app messaging across various platforms.  Cross-promotion: Use push notifications or in-app messages to inform your existing app users about your new app. Craft a compelling message highlighting the new app's features and benefits, and include a call-to-action (CTA) that directs users to the relevant app store for download.

all_reviews.review_title: Most Convenient Push Notification Service for Developers.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal is an easy to use push messaging platform that makes the work of developers very easy. OneSignal is cross platforms which helps us send notifications to our users using our applications on any platforms.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
OneSignal's new sdk depends upon kotlin, which increases the size of the built applications due to heavy packages in kotlin-stdlib. Their current sdk is good but they should fix some issues, I've reported some of them on their github repo too.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal solves our problems by making push messaging more convenient. It helps us by sending notifications to all platforms like : IOS, Android, Windows and Web App with a single click. How convenient is that ! Earlier our push provider wasn't cross platform so we needed to send our notifications individually to all platforms. OneSignal has proven to be an efficient and hassle free platform for us !

all_reviews.review_title: Simplest notifications tool for developers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal is a simple, all-in-one solution for sending out push notifications to users either all at once or in specified segments. It was really easy to get set up and has helped us stay in touch with our users with instant updates. Highly recommended.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
There's sometimes a delay between sending a notification and and all users receiving it, and the platform doesn't offer any explantion why - this has tripped us up a couple of times when sending out urgent updates.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal lets us easily connect with users in real-time, and lets us reach out with personalised and company-wide updates. This has helped us get the word out when new features and promotions are launched.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely simple to integrate and powerful
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I decided we needed to add browser notifications to our app and set out to find a quick and simple way of doing this. I came across OneSignal and found that it would do everything we wanted. Furthermore, it was quick and easy to integrate. I had browser notifications working  and fully integrated into our app within 2 hours, and without installing any 3rd party libraries. It offers a wealth of features and ways to interact. For example, notifications can be broadcast to everyone, or specific segments, or even specific users (based on an external id). Superb product. Highly recommended.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
I haven't found a downside yet. It just works. They even offer a pretty generous free tier. The product also supports email and SMS integration. If I had any criticism it would be that the API documentation could do with a little improvement. More JSON examples would be very helpful - or full object models so we can see how the JSON should be structured on more complex API calls.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed a way to notify specific users or groups of users in our browser-based app of various events. OnsSignal was the pefect solution to our problem. OneSignal allows subscribers to be tagged with an external id. This external id allows us to quickly and easily push notifications to specific users. This allows us to cut down on the number of emails we send, and give users and instant on-screen notification when something changes that they need to know about. We will be looking at extending this functionality to some of our other apps.

all_reviews.review_title: A strenght to my audience OKRs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I find the tool very simple to use, I learned it quickly, and I know it has many features (although I haven't fully explored them yet). The growth of our audience on OneSignal has been meteoric, and is an excellent channel to spread information quickly and uncomplicatedly.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Unfortunately, it does not offer the possibility of audience segmentation for sites developed in AMP technology, such as ours. This isn't good because part of our interest in having the web push service was to be able to talk to the audience in segments. Another thing that I miss is graphs of open rate evolution, for example.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Web pushes help us build an audience that is qualified and interested in what we have to communicate. This is very good because when Google notices that a lot of people are reading a certain content, it understands that it may be relevant to a larger number of people, and ends up promoting it. With this, we generate a positive spin so that more people find what we produce.

all_reviews.review_title: An impressive platform with exceptional customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal is quite straightforward and intuitive to use, but if, for some reason, you are struggling to grasp any part of the platform, their customer support team will be there to help. They are extremely responsive, timely, and provide detailed, thorough guidelines on your next steps. They have made the transition so easy for our team.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
The only real downside of OneSignal is the lack of data available on the platform itself, as with the templates you only have access to conversion rates. It would be wonderful if deeper insights/KPIs were provided, too (such as revenue, CTR, total conversions, etc).

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
OneSignal most certainly makes it easy to automate push campaigns, in-app campaigns, and the like. Whether I'm working to automate a campaign based on certain triggers or want to send a one-off push notification, their platform makes it a breeze.

all_reviews.review_title: Effective and fast tests with OneSignal
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal is a great tool for improving engagement and monetization. It allows testing different types of messages and in-apps, and it offers automatic messages and a/b tests. Also, it is convenient to check the stats.  We use OneSignal for about 3 years now, and the platform changes a lot during this period, which makes it easier to use.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
It is rather some ideas for OneSignal. So, we set up a lot of push messages, it will be useful to have the option to tag them (create a tag manually) and then filter by those tags. This way we can check the same tests we were running in the past within this tag.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use both push and in-apps on OneSignal. Both allow us to test different messages to engage users and convert them into paid users. We use in-apps for cross-promoting and it works really effectively. A big plus is that OneSignal offers a convenient solution to create and test push notifications and in-app messages. It supports different types of media. For the past 3 years, there were tons of improvements in the in-app editor.
