all_reviews.review_title: Delivered above and beyond
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
The ease of use is one of the most attractive features of OneSignal.  Instead of maintaining code for iOS, Android, Web, and Amazon Fire, we have one single codebase.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
There is really nothing that I dislike about the Software.  I would like a couple of more ways to search for existing users, but that's not a big deal.

Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
Consider messaging via Tags if possible.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Push Notifications and Push Messaging in a medical environment.  The delivery of our notifications and messages is a critical part of patient care.  Our Apps run on iOS, Android, Amazon Fire, and PC Browsers, so we have a lot of channels to support.  With OneSignal we can create a single message and have it delivered to unlimited users on all the platforms we support with not extra coding.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect service and QA
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
I like that there is an other person in the other end of the email that understands you. The services are amazing! I can not beleve i found this and start using it. It way easier than I'd ever expected it to be. Documentation is perfect. Even though there should be less transparancy between the web-push world and the mobile push. Seems like they might me mixed in the doc. Lucky for me that I only use the simple stuff and that I'm VERY happy with the service. I should have known about this two years ago. That would have saved me alot of trouble and long nights. I was up and running within minutes! Both on iOS and Android. Of cource I have a lot of expiriance with the iOS push already so many of the things needed - I had them. For new users iOS push can be tricky. That's just in general.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
Not much. Still a rookie user but I've tested and played around with the service for hours. Keeps impressing me how easy OneSignal makes this. And when I know that the "things behind" are VERY complex and hard to keep track of. Right now there is nothing that I dislike.

Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
If you need a simple API and simple push functionality this is the way to go. Took minutes to set up. Works like a charm. Saving time and efford to make this work.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
The GDPR as an exmaple. I ask about it and OneSignal kindly ask me to seek legal consulating for that matter. But the doc clearly stated was was subject to a GDPR violation and how to avoid it. Makes perfect sence. Nothing technical. The guides where all I needed to get going. Also I asked about "tags". Can I have a "tag" array. One tag and multiple values. I got a very god answer on that also.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful solutions for push notifcations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
OneSignal's dashboard and API supports easy-to-use features including segmentation, A/B testing, scheduling, and analytics.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
The initial install is kind of tough if you do not have any coding experience. The customer service has been average but still has been responsive.

Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
OneSignal is a great solution to push notifications for mobile app, Be sure that you have your API's updated as we have found that there are some differences within these solutions. This software is very valuable for any business looking to provide strong push notifications for business.

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed to support push notifications for our business updates and ongoing information sets. The OneSignal platfrom made this very simple and we have been extremely happy with this high quality service.

all_reviews.review_title: My OneSignal Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about OneSignal?
Integrating OneSignal into your mobile app and server calls is extremely easy thanks to their API documentation and SDKs. Their dashboard UI is great too and can help you debug messages being delivered or failing. They are free (but share your data with vendors) or you can pay a fee to not have the data shared.

What do you dislike about OneSignal?
OneSignal 503s quite often sometimes push notifications fail, although these issues have happened less and less over time. Dont have a 24/7 Support

Recommendations to others considering OneSignal:
A push notification service for free! There's no greater benefit than zero cost to consumer!

What problems is OneSignal solving and how is that benefiting you?
Push notification for web sites.
